headerSubtitle: Your friendly guide to understanding web status codes, powered by Gemini.
surpriseMeAriaLabel: Get explanation for a random status code
initialStateMessage: Enter a 3-digit HTTP status code above to get a simple explanation and a helpful analogy.
footerText: Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and the Google Gemini API.
errorInvalidCode: Please enter a valid 3-digit HTTP status code.
errorFetchFailed: Failed to get explanation for status code {code}. {error}
